caption: Best pizza I've ever had, honestly. Period. And the service was outstanding. I will be spreading the word.
The best pizza ever
Best pizza!!! Beautiful cozy place!!
This pizza has to be one of the better ones I have tasted recently. It has great flavor! I would highly recommend. The parmesan bread and fries are so good!
I love their garlic parmesan fries.

Just landed from Tampa. I was looking for a place to eat after visiting a Latin Bar, and what an amazing surprise. This pizza is amazing! I order a vegetarian option, mushrooms and onions, and it was the best pizza I ever eat. Thank you. Awesome service and amazing food!

The pizza is great here regardless of which one you pick. I usually place an order online or over the phone, but the last few times I've gone into the establishment to order and have been met with horrible customer service. I've been ignored, with the employees being "too busy" to acknowledge me and skipped over while waiting in line to place an order. Because of this, I'm unsure as to whether I'll continue to order from here.
Order the mushroom pizza! 🍕 🍄😋 You will not be disappointed!
Great pizza. We really enjoyed something other than Chicago style.
I want to give a shout-out to the manger & his night crew !!! Best pizza I have had in years ! Pizza was made with love BIG FACTS!  MUST TRY THERE PIZZA!
Pretty good little pizza joint.

I have loved every single pizza that I've ordered from Bob's since they opened. Bob's actually became my favorite spot after only the first time I tried the pepperoni pizza. The crust is soft, bubbly, and with just the right amount of chew. I love that they put fresh basil under the cheese, too. I had the meatball today, which is what prompted me to finally review. It had the perfect ratio of sauce, cheese and toppings, which is great because I cannot get enough of those tender, perfectly seasoned meatballs.  I can also attest to the pickle pizza with mortadella being a once in a while favorite. The brussel sprout/arugula caesar is always fresh and be sure you get an oatmeal cream pie (I like to put mine in the freezer while I'm eating pizza then eating it cold).  Thank you for consistently delivering fresh, quality food!! Best pizza in Chicago :)

This is probably the best pizza I ever had. You can taste every ingredient they put in the pizza. Nothing but what seems like best quality ingredients paired with the rustic crisp. This pizza is on another level. Price is also very fair for the quality you get. Only down side. I wished they opened sooner on weekdays. Some people want Bob's at noon!
Best pizza in Chicago
Loved the hot wings, fries, and Bob's sausage pizza. I'll be taking another detour for carry-out soon
BOBS PIZZA IS THE FUTURE OF CHICAGO PIZZA! Must try Bob's they have some of the best pizza I have tried in years. The salads are also amazing. Highly recommend if you have not tried Bob's yet.

Did anyone else get a bad first impression with  Bob’s kitchen staff? I ordered something simple thru Uber eats , a large pizza and a chef salad with Vinaigrette dressing And utensils, and I get Honey mustard instead of vinaigrette and no utensils for the salad, Are these mistakes common at Bob’s kitchen?
My salad came with a fly. Why this place has a 4 point something review, I don’t know!!
Pickle pizza <3
The pickle pizza is the bomb

Recommended by my manager, one of the great pizza places. They have speciality pizzas as well as you can make your own pizza. Nice quantity and amazing taste. They also offer BYOB if you want to get drinks. They have 2 locations in Chicago: Pilsen and Old Town

Ordered a couple of pies yesterday. The pepperoni was good, especially since we added on mushrooms. The sausage, however, was the saddest sausage pizza I’ve ever seen. Where’s the beef? Guess who ended up with the slice with only one sausage? Me. Hope they aren’t starting to skimp out on ingredients already. This definitely can’t be “Bob’s favorite.”  We also tried out the chicken wings. Both sauces were tasty, but the chicken itself was bland. Definitely not worth the price.  We’ve also tried the pickle, wild mushroom and grass fed meatball pizzas in the past. The pickle and mushroom pizzas are pretty good. The meatball pizza wasn’t that good, and they don’t put a lot of meatballs on it either.  Sadly this won’t be my to-go pizza place since sausage is my preferred pizza topping.

My go-to pizza joint. Tried most of their pizzas selections and they’re all delicious. Also doesn’t help that I live a couple steps alway. BOGO deal is an amazing here. The pizza’s are large and I always have leftovers which taste just as good after tossing in the toaster oven.

Hamds down THE BEST pizza around all the Pilsen, S Loop and nearby neighborhoods. And the only real NY style around. So happy to find this new place, thank you for being in the neighborhood!! 100% recommended (and the service is spot on to boot).

Best place for a classic NY slice!! Not the biggest fan of deep dish pizza so definitely need my Bob’s fix every once in a while. The classic cheese is amazing. And my favorite specialty pizza is the mushroom one. So delicious! The outdoor patio is also beautiful and you’re surrounded by their fresh basil. Definitely would recommend to any specialty pizza lover.

After seeing this place pop up on a listing of 'Best Pizza Places in Chi', I finally got around to trying it on a hot Summer day. I had the Wild Mushroom specialty pizza, and it was easily the best I've had at that price point in Chicago. I think other places would charge almost double for something like that. Easy online ordering to bat!

Hands down THE BEST pizza I have had in a long long time.  I had no idea about this place until I stumbled upon it on line.  Boy are we ever glad we did!  We took a chance based on all the reviews...They lived up to them above and beyond!  The pizza was perfection, the wings were amazing, and don't get me started on the garlic parmesan fries!  The staff was incredible, kind, friendly, professional and courteous.  Our new favorite pizza place, you will be seeing a whole lot of us! Thanks for a great meal experience!

Great pizza. Love the simple concept of adding your own toppings and a couple of special pizzas. The pizza was crusty at the bottom and very tasty with the cheese and tomatoe sauce on top. Will definitly go there again.
Service was spectacular!!
Excellent crust, creative toppings and nice people
These guys offer the some of the best pizza's with some of best owners around!
This place is definitely my favorite. Kinda crushin on the redhead too.😮
Pickle Pizza is a MUST.

I never usually bother leaving reviews for anything...but Bob's pizza is the best. Only ever ordered takeout so not sure what dine-in is like. But damn. you have to at least give this place a shot. Something about the spicy/sweet flavor is like crack for me. I could inhale this pizza all day long.
good pizza. very nice staff. they have a happy hour deal where if you call them 4-6pm Monday through Thursday it's BOGO pizzas
Best hot wings! Awesome customer service!

This place is absolutely incredible!  We adore the owners/management team. The pizza is fantastic but the people are even better.  They have made such a sincere effort to become a part of the community. Fresh pizza, fresh ingredients. Support this place please! Let's keep it around for a long time

I had a pretty basic pizza pep n half jalepeno the pizza was fai i dont like that i called twice to ask if i can have my pizza cut in squares. But calling twice and asking still no squares the midddle of the pizza was so thin was almost just cheese. I will try this pilsen spot one more time

I got the pepperoni pizza. It was rather salty And the bottom was burnt. I added tomato to balance it out. Definitely needed more sauce.  I also ordered the oatmeal cream pie and the cream tasted like thick whipped unsalted butter with very little sugar so The cream mostly didn’t taste like anything. I did like the oatmeal cookie part.
Delicious pizza - the pickle pizza is a must try!  The customer service is fantastic and they have a happy hour deal that you can't pass up!
Great customer service and even better pizza.  Everything we have had was perfect.  Thank you Bob's!
Never been. It was another failed pizza joint before it was bobs. I give it a three because even when pizza is bad...it's still pretty good.
Best pizza I have had highly reccomend.  Great Service.
I rarely leave reviews for anything. This pizza is so good. It tastes fresh and has a nice crust and sauce. It's the best pizza in the area hands down!

I was lost and now I am found thanks to Bob's Pizza. We don't have to pretend anymore at the Med or Giordanos. Like the moon giving life to clouds at night, Bob's Pizza gave us the pizza we needed to be happy.
Best pizza in Chicago.

Ever since I saw a picture of their carne Asada fries on Instagram I've been dying to come here. I've seen lots of pictures of their food all over the web, but never a picture of the restaurant so I was a little surprised at the size when we walked in.  It's very small inside, only 3 or 4 tables.  There's a menu board or you can grab a menu and sit down, then you order at the counter. Of course we had to get the carne Asada fries (a small which was still huge). They were really good! They come drizzled with guacamole and sour cream , and the meat is cooked perfect. But still for two people we couldn't finish. Then we tried 3 tacos, the fish, the shrimp, and the al pastor. My favorite was the shrimp, though I really enjoyed them all, and my friends favorite was the fish, it was cooked perfectly. We also got the street corn and since we were sharing we cut it off the cob. It was good, but I would have liked it with a little more chili powder.
worst place to go they have rats inside the place.
(Translated by Google) Pickle 'For  (Original) Pickle 'Za
Love this place! Amazing crust, diverse and creative recipes. Can't wait to come back!
Unreal food, they took me outside my comfort zone and it was AMAZING!!!!
Truly amazing. Crust was a combo of crispy and chewy. Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!! Eat it now.
Excellent neighborhood pizza.  Anything with mushrooms is delish.
Love their services
Great place great staff
The pickle pizza was worth all the hype and I enjoyed the spinach pesto stracciatella with the vegetarian option. Definitely going to visit them again and again to try their other menu items.
Wow what a delicious place. Was a first timer tonight and will for sure be back a dozen more times. Nice vibe inside, and friendly people. Most important though DELICIOUS PIZZA!

Oh. My. Gosh. This is the best pizza place I’ve been to in the city. Finally found one. Crust is bomb. The meatball pizza was packed with flavor, delicious toppings, and excellent sauce. We ordered take out but I fully intend to return for a sit down meal.
Pizza was mediocre. I would not recommend this place if you want authentic Chicago Style Pizza.
Beautiful pie. Great service. I'd put this top 5 in Chicago for sure. If you're a real pizza lover, do not skip Bob's.
Solid pizza

I wanted to love this place, and they made it hard for me not to. This is one of the best pizza places in the city. It's not thin-crust Neapolitan style or really thick Chicago-style stuff, but whatever it is, it's great. The classic red sauce and pepperoni or sausage type pies are delicious, as are the more experimental ones like their "pickle pizza." They also make a solid gluten-free pie (not on the level of Forno Rosso, but good). Last but not least, the staff is always friendly and make you want to come back. Everything you want from a sit-down neighborhood pizza place. (Also BYOB)

TL; DR - The pizza was good but not great; the service was atrocious.  My friends and I ordered a sausage pizza and a pickle pizza. The kitchen was slammed with takeout orders when we arrived, so we expected a bit of a wait. That said, it took an hour and a half for our first pizza to arrive, and two hours for the second one. While we waited, I went to the front counter and asked a staff member for water. I had to return and ask three more times before we finally received some.  The sausage pizza came out first. It was good,  but ultimately nothing special (certainly not worth waiting for an hour and a half). While the pickled onions on top were tangy and sweet and the crust was perfectly baked, it did not have a lot of sausage. It was more like a cheese pizza with some pickled onions thrown on top, which did not meet my expectations.  The pickle pizza was next. This one was more interesting - it's a white pizza with pickles, mortadella, and dill. Overall, it was good - the flavors played well together, the quantity of toppings was good, and I was glad that there was no tomato sauce - but it was nothing to write home about. Unfortunately, ours was short on dill (apparently they ran out), which could have perked it up a bit.  While my experience may have been a fluke, that does not diminish its unpleasantness. I get that many restaurants run on thin margins and need to provide delivery services to make money, but doing so at the expense of one's dine-in patrons does not seem like a recipe for long-term success. Perhaps adding a couple of staff members to the kitchen during peak ordering hours could alleviate some of the chaos.

Rising star in the pizza scene! The pies here are insanely delicious and cheaper than I'd expect for how artisanal they taste. The happy hour is a steal and I've made this my regular for all things pizza.

I haven't been disappointed with a pizza yet from Bob's. They aren't the cheapest, but make up for it with their flavor and ingredients. The owner is super friendly and is sure to stop by your table to make sure everything is great. If you're trying to save some money, they have a great happy hour deal on weekdays for BOGO, AND it's always BYOB, so grab some friends and some beer and check this place out. You can't go wrong with the Bob's Sausage Pizza, and definitely get the mushrooms with it! My one complaint would be that the sausage pizza can lack structure and be a bit difficult to eat without a fork.

I am so happy to say that this is literally my favorite gluten-free pizza EVER!!! The truffle honey is amazing. It’s two blocks away from me and I’ve already ordered it twice this month 😫 Please consider selling the truffle honey in bottles!
Pizza is great and staff is awesome!!! They made a mistake on my order and gave me the correct pizza for free! Recommend everyday!
This spot is awesome! Proper pizza! Jump on this!!

The first time I ever order from this place and the Grubhub delivery driver stole the pizza. It’s a shame they outsourced their drivers to save a buck. There’s plenty of other pizza in Chicago though!

Their Pizza is absolutely delicious and unique. I don't think there's anything like it in Chicago. So far I've loved every single thing I've tried there. They have delicious bread mixed with really unique ingredients and recipes The mushroom pizza is amazing the pesto Pizza is so unique the meat is all from local farms and you can tell by his quality. Also the garlic fries. Amazing. . Definitely a must if you want to explore which Chicago has to offer as far as Cuisine and pizza.
rating the pizza. all flop, cheese falling off, etc. cool spot though, friendly staff, and a coupon from the manager for a free pie. don't know if it is worth the trip

Didn't have a very good first experience here. Pizza was undercooked, floppy crust and all ingredients fell off. Manager checked in on us and we told him our experience so he gave us a free pizza for next time but I probably won't even use it.
Amazing pizza.  Can't get enough.  Great location right in the middle of Pilsen.
Solid Pizza and great service. Matt, the owner, always has some good suggestions for pizza toppings.

Solid Pie. Just moved to Pilsen a couple months back, typically try to find my "Go To" spots.  Happy to stumble upon this place, crust is great, great flavors, you don't feel scammed like other NY style pizza places. Overall solid place! Thanks Bob's Pizza.
Very delicious!!! The meatballs... Yum!! First time, won't be the last time😊 thanks guys!

I was just complaining about how i can’t find good NY style pizza since Big G’s closed. I just ordered a cheese pizza while hungover and it’s AMAZING. I also got the hot blue cheese fries, which aren’t my favorite thing, but they’re still good.  This is so close to my house, I’ll definitely be ordering again.
Best pizza!
Best Pizza 🍕 in Chicago hands down! Yum 😋 Yum Yum 😋

Best pizza I’ve had in my life!!! Dough made out of beer and is just amazing delicious everything!! We had the pesto spinach staciatella, the wild mushrooms and the pickle ones and they were all outstanding! And Bob is just great, kind friendly and obviously best cook! Highly recommended!
Great pizza,polite service,clean,professional.Will recommend😊

This is the best pizza in Chicago. Coalfire, Craft Pizza, Piece, Bonci, Lou's or Pequods...Bob's FTW. If you want flavor, outstanding toppings and combinations, ample crust that you WANT TO FINISH with through and through crunch, great staff and in a scenic low-key neighborhood location... You cannot go wrong with Bob's Pizza.  We live around the corner and can't wait for winter to just stumble over and devour the pizza. Plus, BYOB!

Pizza was incredible. We got the mushroom and brie pizza, pickle pizza, and garlic parmesan fries, and were happy with everything. The fries were perfectly cooked, and the pizza crust held up well with all of the toppings. The staff was sort friendly as well. BYOB.

I was skeptical when this place opened in the former location of a short-lived Gino's East, but after trying it once it's become a regular go-to for me, and I hope they stick around as they are a great addition to the neighborhood. Welcoming staff, great pizza, and BYOB.
Great pizza. Distinct style executed perfectly.

Great pizza. My roommate ordered a cheese pie and we shared it. Closest I've had to NYC style pizza in Chicago; base is just thin enough to hold its weight while being foldable, no crumbling cracker-y crust here. Cheese and sauce are both nice and flavorful and play off each other well without either of them being overpoweringly heavy. And the edges of the crust are nice and puffy. Lovely. I'll definitely be eating here again. 💖🍕

The staff were so welcoming and friendly, giving us advice on the local area as we are in Pilsen for a few days as part of a road trip. The food was incredible (we shared a cheese pizza with mushrooms and spinach) and the ambience was great.We were so glad we came here! Really made our day. Thanks a lot guys!

Love this pizza it has such a great flavor. The atmosphere is fun and the staff is really nice and accommodating. The first time we visited the owner waited on us and was super friendly and I could tell he genuinely wanted us to have a wonderful experience. And we did! Would definitely recommend this place. So happy it's in our neighborhood!
Great Pizza! And amazing customer service.
Nice little restaurant. Not a ton of space but it's never been crowded at the times I went. Food is delicious, especially the parmesan wings and sausage pizza.
Great quality pizzas, friendly staff, and a nice ambience. The crust is really different from other Chicagoland pizzas. Great pizza for carryout or dine-in.
Awesome service great pizza try the garlic parmesan fries and wings 😋😋😋😋😋

Hands down the best pizza I’ve ever had.  Even the cheese pizza is delicious.  I’m usually bummed out cause that’s all my daughter will eat, she only eats a slice, so I’m stuck with... meh.  Now I’m excited to get it.  Turns out she really likes the pickle pizza too, which is totally mind blowing.  Staff is friendly.  Very excited about this place.
Great New York style pies
This is one of the better pizzas I’ve had in some time. Incredible crust. Staff is engaging and friendly. Met one of the owners who was crazy nice. 10/10 would definitely recommend
Was greated at the door. Super friendly staff. The meatballs and pizza are absolutely amazing. Definitely glad I stopped in for some lunch. Will definitely be coming back.
Definitely worth checking out.  Amazing pizza.
Went here for my birthday—great place! We were a group of 10 and it was a perfect place for a group that size. The pizza was awesome and it is BYOB—hard to beat!
I've ordered for pick-up a couple times and their pizza is really good. Hopefully they add some vegan options soon!
Great pizza and service
Pepperoni pizza and oatmeal pie were SOOOOOO GOOOOOOOD.
Got delivery quickly.  The sausage pizza is amazing and fresh. Plenty of ingredients. Chewy crust. Will order again.
Great NY style pizza.
Hand pulled pizza with original combos of toppings. Also BYOB

Creative, delicious menu! Crust was a high point. We loved this month's special - Farmer's Market - esp with that roasted garlic, yum!!! We'll be back to try more things. Oh and don't miss the great deal Bob is running!!! Two for one, Monday-Thursday, before 6!
Huge pie with fresh ingredients at an extremely reasonable price. The service was fantastic and the food was even better. Don’t snooze.
Great pizza. Very unique flavors on the pickle pizza. Highly recommend ordering the prosciutto with it. Listen to Bob! He knows his pizza.
1st time ordering delivery. So freaking good! Literally stopped eating to write this review! Lol Don't miss the monkey bread!
Got carry out, great pizza. Sauce is excellent. Added outdoor seating recently. Neighborhood gem, hope they get lots of business.
Fast! Awesome crust.
If u want good NY style pizza...don't sleep on Bob's. Amazing pizza, perfect crust. Great atmosphere. Very friendly service. BYOB. Affordable prices. Can't beat this.
Fantastic pizza!

New, cozy, comfy dining room. BYOB, with real glasses, no plastic cups here! Friendly service. The pizzas are great. Bubbly thin crust, just the right amount of toppings, not overly cheesed. The wings are close to perfect 👌
Delicious pizza, can't wait to try the wings
Excellent pizza & salads.
Third time here and their pizza is really good, plus amazing service and they actually look like they care about you and the pizza. 🙌
The grass-fed beef meatballs were fantastic. We had the pickle pizza and the pepperoni pizza. Both were so delicious. I look forward to trying the other pizzas in the future!
Great salad, great pizza, great staff!

I'm a long time resident in Pilsen and my family are in from out of town. We were looking for a a good pizza place in the neighborhood.  Well, this place out done itself!  First, the staff are very friendly and informative about the menu. The pizza is light, thin crust with a light savory red sauce.  I say this because I'm not a fan of red sauce, but this one is delicious!  The spinach pesto stracciatella pizza was another one that was also great! Will be returning to try the appitizers and the other pizzas! Welcome to the neighborhood and great success!
What an all around perfectly delicious experience. Can’t say enough good things. If you appreciate good food, you will not be disappointed.

Great pizza at a great price and the wings are amazing! The owner was was very friendly and out working the tables, it was nice to see he's so hands on. Can't wait to go back and try a few different pizzas!

You don't expect this kind of pizzeria in the middle of the neighborhood like this. All three elements of a good pizza; crust, sauce and toppings are very good. I have been here only once, so I can only give first impression. Also I am a vegetarian, so no meat.  I added the hot sauce for extra, but that's a mistake as it prevented me from experiencing the base Sauce. I won't be doing that again ☹️. The mushrooms toppings was fresh not from a can. But they were chunky rather than sliced, which is how I prefer. The crust is very good. Not exactly Neapolitan, but real close. It comes to the table all puffy. Ask for a side of sauce for dipping.  All in all, I am really chuffed to have a pizzeria of this quality in my neighborhood. It's a little more expensive than what I expect but I am happy to pay. Well done 👍
The Shrimp Scampi and potato pizza was delicious. I have enjoyed every pizza that I have tried on the menu...salads, meatballs and wings are a must to experience, also
Just had it at my building’s summer party and I can’t wait to go to actual restaurant and enjoy it.
I live around the corner from Bob's and that pizza is really delicious!

HONEST REVIEW: I came here at about 4:20pm on a Sunday. I called the za in (large spinach/Tom) and it was a reddy within 20 mins. It was purfect for me and my roommate to split, the sauce is gr8 and the crust is gr8 too.,  5/5 would dine again, here’s some fotos for you to enjoy thx ;)

Some of the best pizza in Chicago. Not deep dish, not thin cracker crust, not fancy wood fire pizza. Good quality, chewy, substantial pizza. We went on Saturday and got an excellent pickle pizza (yes it is weird but amazing) probably going back on Wednesday.

Delicious food, quick service, and friendly staff! My table tried the Mac and cheese, their savory monkey bread, cheese pizza and the spinach pesto and stracciatella. Everything was excellent, great flavor and all. I will definitely be back!
Favorite pizza in Chicago. BYOB
Totally amazing pizza. The owner was humble, kind, helpful and fun. So grateful to have a really really delicious pizza spot in Pilsen. Can’t wait to go back here. GET THE PICKLE PIZZA!!!
I had delivery of mushroom pepperoni.   It was beyond delicious.  BYOB WITH THE CORNER GROCERY SELLING BEER!!  Baby!!!

Following my friend couple’s recommendation, my wife and I tried their pizzas today and absolutely loved it. Thin crust, very chewy and tasty. Def coming back to try other menu soon! Mathew, the server, also was very kind and attentive so def a plus!
Great pizza!!!
Delicious and extremely reasonable pricing for the amount and quality of food. I am planning to go again this weekend, hope they have anchovies this time!

There was a “hiccup” in my first delivery order ever placed. The owner himself called me to apologize.  I get the impression that this place cares -and the food is delicious and moderately priced too!
We absolutely love Bob’s pizza and it is now our favorite in Chicago.  We’ve tried 4 different pizzas and all have been amazing.  We can tell the food is chef created—so flavorful and fresh!
Amazing pizza, great value for money and helpful staff. I've never tried anything like the pickle pizza before, top marks!
Good pizza, I recommend selling by the slice.
The dill pickle, mortadella and dill pizza is so cool and delicious.  And, BYOB!
I am so happy to have a really good pizza place walking distance from me! Everyone here is so nice. Not only are the pizzas delicious, they are made quite quickly too.
Delicious pizza. We tried 3 different pies (pepperoni, pickle, and sausage) and they were all tasty with an AMAZING crust. Check it out....you won’t regret it!
(Translated by Google) Delicious pizza  (Original) Deliciosas pizza
Friendly staff that puts a premium on quality. Uniquely bold pizzas are a plus. Monkey bread is a must.

Spinach, pesto and straciatella pizza was really great.  I had some left over and ate it cold and that was great too.  The crust is pretty soft, but with still a good amount of crunchiness to it.  I had a few different apps.  The hot wings and meatballs we're my favorites by far.  Wings have a good amount of spiciness but definitely not too much.  Bob's has themselves a new fan!
Great food, cool interior, friendly service. BYOB. Will be returning!
Great decor, amazing customer service, and the absolute best pizza that I've ever had! I will definitely return.
Phenomenal pizza, with a great cook named Nick.

Great pizza with an incredible dough. Thin (not cracker thin) and crispy with a delightful chew. Hand tossed to order (which does take more time depending on how busy they are) results in a light crust pocketed with crunchy bubbles. The standard pizza is 16", but an 8" is available if you walk in.  No slices are sold here. At first this bummed me out until the owner explained why. Simply put, they cook every pie to order, fresh fresh fresh. And you can't cook a slice. You won't find half eaten pizzas under a heat lamp here.  I recommend a traditional sausage pizza (thiers is topped with pickled onions, a hint of lemon) and the meatballs (house pickles, pickled onions, black pepper mayo, and biscuit like bread).  Currently Bob's is BYO, there is a liquor store across the street (closes at 9pm) and they keep it cold for you. They said they are getting thier license soon, as well as a patio.  Happy hour? Yes! But one pie get one free.  Absolute gem. Welcome to Pilsen Bob!

Amazing pizza and appetizers. Great casual, clean ambiance inside the restaurant. Excellent service and overall experience. The takeout experience is superb as well, as are the leftovers the next day. It's hard to say enough good things about this place - it's easily one of the best pizza places in the city and suburbs.

Delicious pizza, exceptional service and friendly atmosphere. The pepperoni has so much flavor and their crust is the perfect balance of light, fluffy and crispy. So tasty that my boyfriend and I finished the whole pizza!

Crust is foldable but not too thin, with bubbles and a bit of char. I asked about the toppings and they're legit,  parmesan and prosciutto are DOP (actual Italian).  We had the hotwings as well, where the crispness holds up to the sauce. You can hear each bite, they're incredible.  Currently it's byob but they said that might change, so go while you can. There's a liquor store across the street.
The arugula salad is a must try!!!! We had a cheese pizza and it hit the spot!
Good food & good people!

Small pizza spot nice interior. Pizza more artisan. Light on ingredients that you are paying for. Crust is extremely light and very tasty. Onion on pizza add little. Sauce is mild and amount put on pie is light. Cheese was sparse. Sausage did not taste like Italian seasoning.  I'm rooting for this place hopefully adjustment are made and the owner doesn't let his idea block a successful business. Opening for lunch is highly recommended! Pilsen has a large market for pizza and lunch crowd is huge.

Amazing pizza and salad, especially for the price. Very kind staff who are really passionate about their craft. Talked with Matthew, the co-owner, and learned so much about his pizza. He uses beer in his dough - never even knew you could do that! Very good food, genuine people - what more could you ask for?!

This is a unique experience, well worth try and keep coming back to, their pizza is not your usual "Chicago fat pie" nor "NY dry flatbread" but rather is very well designed to be rich in flavor and have a defined personality. It doesn't try to mimic other big pizzerias but dares to make its own style and succeeds. Highly recommended
Really good pizza. Great crust and cheese on the cheese pizza. Friendly counter service & BYOB. Everything I want in a pizza spot.

Ordered a pizza for pick-up via their website - half Bob's Pepperoni and half Bob's Sausage with mushrooms. The transaction was smooth, the website was easy to use, and the restaurant called me afterwards to confirm. My food was ready in about 12 minutes.  When I got to the restaurant, the space itself was nicely designed and the employees were friendly and attentive. Their pizza is the best I've had in Pilsen - the crust is a bit basic, but the pizza had good quality ingredients. No deep dish here, just your traditional pizza place. I'll definitely be back next time I'm in a pizza mood.
Delicious thin crust. If you’re in the mood for light airy crust for a change go here

Great guys. Amazing pie. Hand tossed with a thin crust that's just crispy enough but still tender with good chew and not a cracker.  Loved the pepperoni and basil we ordered, might be our new fav in Chicago (Coalfire and Pleasant House Bakery are our other 2 go to's).  The outer edge of the crust was amazing.  Super light and airy.  Like Pizza-Croissant.  But better.  Because pizza.
Great spot run by awesome people. Pizza is amazing as are the apps and salads available. Affordable prices and BYOB beer and wine. Can’t go wrong.
The chicken sausage pizza is amazing. The Green Chile’s on the pizza were out of this world. Will definitely be back.

I highly recommend the meatball sliders! The pizza was amazing. Salad was beautiful and delicious. The place was really cool. Reader of my review, you should go here. I only wish they were open for lunch so I could eat there more

We got the Spinach Pesto & Straciatella pizza and the Sausage pizza... both were delicious. Service was great. And the inside of this place was nice and cozy. Would recommend and can’t wait to return!
It’s a great new spot! Pizza was delicious

Loved everything about this place. Great local owners, atmosphere, and the food was AMAZING. Such a great addition to the neighborhood. Please come and enjoy yourself some pizza (we took a leap with the pickle pizza and were so pleased) so this gem of a restaurant sticks around for years to come.
Wow! ! gourmet pizza. Chef Matt just cornered the market on pizza in Pilsen. An associate told me to check it out, that the place is run by a certified chef.  Will definitely be back.
The pizza is great. I really liked the fast service, and great pizza quality. Definitely coming back soon!!!
